data.label: libtnet
data.description: libtnet 是一个用 C++ 编写的高性能网络库，它在设计上面主要参考 Tornado，为服务端网络编程提供简洁而高效的接口，非常易于使用。

data.label: libtnet
data.description: libtnet is a high-performance network library written in C++, mainly referencing Tornado in its design, providing a simple and efficient interface for server-side network programming, very easy to use.
